title: Start
body:
<<if flag.rarity.visited>>
Oh welcome back dear! How can I help you today?
<<else>>
Hello and welcome to carousele boutique. I am rarity, fashion designer and seamstress. How can I be of service?
<<set flag.rarity.visited to true>>
<<endif>>
-> I would like to browse your inventory
    <<Open Shop>>
-> Uh, nothing.
    If you say so dear. But if you ever have the need to dress up proper do come back.
